Uses of Package
org.opensha.eq.forecast

  • Packages that use org.opensha.eq.forecast 
    Package Description
    org.opensha.calc  
    org.opensha.eq.fault.surface  
    org.opensha.eq.forecast  
    org.opensha.gmm
    Provides implementations of all GroundMotionModels used in the 2008 and 2014 USGS National Seismic Hazard Models.
  • Classes in org.opensha.eq.forecast used by org.opensha.calc 
    Class and Description
    Forecast
    An earthquake hazard Forecast is the top-level wrapper for earthquake Source definitions and attendant GroundMotionModels used in probabilisitic seismic hazard analyses (PSHAs) and related calculations.
  • Classes in org.opensha.eq.forecast used by org.opensha.eq.fault.surface 
    Class and Description
    Distances
    Distance value wrapper.
  • Classes in org.opensha.eq.forecast used by org.opensha.eq.forecast 
    Class and Description
    ClusterSource
    Cluster source representation.
    Distances
    Distance value wrapper.
    FaultSource
    Fault source representation.
    FaultSourceSet
    Wrapper class for related FaultSources.
    FloatStyle
    Ways in which Ruptures may float on a fault surface.
    Forecast
    An earthquake hazard Forecast is the top-level wrapper for earthquake Source definitions and attendant GroundMotionModels used in probabilisitic seismic hazard analyses (PSHAs) and related calculations.
    GmmSet
    Wrapper class for GroundMotionModels associated with a SourceSet.
    IndexedFaultSourceSet.IndexedFaultSource 
    InterfaceSource
    Subduction source representation.
    PointSourceType
    Point source implementation identifier.
    Rupture
    A Rupture is a proxy for an actual earthquake and encapsulates all the source information required by a ground motion model (Gmm).
    Source
    An earthquake Source; usually some physical or pseudo-representation of a fault and associated IncrementalMfds governing the size and rate of all possible Ruptures.
    SourceAttribute
    Forecast source XML attributes.
    SourceElement
    Forecast source XML elements.
    SourceSet
    Wrapper class for groups of Sources of similar SourceType.
    SourceType
    Identifier for different earthquake Source types.

    Distances
    Distance value wrapper.
